issue.title: [CF 50] Request: More options for "condition"
issue.body:
I wish me more options for "condition" -
I drive a icon so that it may primarily view the absence of a buff (which works now) and an additional Buff existing condition can also be met.

Practical: I make an icon that will show the "Bane of Agony" on a target does not exist, but it should also not show the icon when the "Bane of Doom" is available. Because only one can be only on the target.

And a Option for "target is dead/nodead"

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user TomHB | Imported from CurseForge issue #50 | Raw

comments.body:
I don't get it. You already can enter multiple debuffs for the same icon. Icons can also check if another icon is shown. I will add a UnitIsDead check, though.

Thank you for all of the translation you submitted, by the way.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry, my fault...! I have now fix my problem ;)

There are a issues with the german special characters "Ã¤" (maybe other too), it will be correct displayed.


> Posted by CurseForge user TomHB
